module.name: updateSkinJointsOrder
module.run:
import pymel.core as pm
jointsFromGeo = pm.PyNode(@getOrderFromGeo) joints = pm.PyNode(pm.mel.eval("findRelatedSkinCluster "+jointsFromGeo)).getInfluence()
for geo in @geoList: if not pm.mel.eval("findRelatedSkinCluster "+geo): warning("%s is not skinned"%geo) continue
newGeo = pm.duplicate(geo)[0] pm.skinCluster(newGeo, joints, tsb=True)
pm.select(geo, newGeo) pm.copySkinWeights(nm=True, sa="closestPoint", ia=["oneToOne", "closestJoint"])
pm.delete(geo) newGeo.rename(geo)
